mean_cn: adv. 任何；  adj. 无论什么的；  pron. 无论什么，任何
mean_en: not at all; not of any kind
word_etyma: whatso + ev =age （年龄，时代） + er [形容词及副词后缀], 表示比较级“更...” → whatsoever (用于否定句中以加强语气)任何
short_phrase: She has no interest in you whatsoever.
sentence: You're asking me on a date?! I have no interest in you whatsoever!
sentence_trans: 你是在约我吗？但我对你没有任何兴趣诶！
